dc_title_s: Carta universal en que se contierne todo lo que del mundo se ha descubierto fasta agora hizola Diego Ribero cosmographo de Su magestad. Año de 1529 é Sevilla
dc_description_s: The Second Borgian map by Diego Ribero, Seville 1529.; Reproduced from the original in the Museum of the "Propaganda in Rome... by W. Griggs, London."; Reproduction ä la taille de l'original qui est conservé maintenant ä la Bibliothéque vaticane.|140 x 59 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,000,000|General Map Collection
